 Sausage is not a trademark nor copyright owned.

@EU_Commission 1.1 (...) in Europe and the meat merchants and farmers threatens us, and makes our lives very difficult. It would be advisable when it is about FOOD that our community, be represented by vegans or vegetarians and not just people whose opinion comes with no experience (...)

@EU_Commission 0.6  (...)
alive. Vegetarian culture is older than the European commission . Vegetarian sausages preexist your law by more than decades even centuries.
Thank you for understanding my concern as I am deeply offended by this racist law.
Vanessa.

@EU_Commission 0.5 (...) Without asking Europe to integrate or be colonised by THE LORD OF THE RINGS and the Welsh fairy world, 
 I would very much appreciate you revise this law and give us back as European citizens the freedom to define OUR DIFFERENT cultures by keeping it real and (...)

@EU_Commission 0.4  (...) original name. The Glomorgan sausage IS NOT A PATTI. This punishing strategy against the Welsh people by making the name GLOMORGAN SAUSAGE illegal in Europe can only be perceived as racist because it is. You are excluding a people with a law that makes no sense. (...)

@EU_Commission 0.3  (...) reminder of famine and survival during poverty. It is a recipe that belongs to the Welsh people and is a few hundred years old. Your law makes it illegal for Welsh Glomorgan sausages to be made and sold in Europe  enforcing the name PATTI which is not the (...)

@EU_Commission 0.2 You did this a few months after the Brexit, offending deeply  a People who already suffer being a not very numerous nor very represented but proud people as they should. As you know, the Glomorgan sausage is a sausage roll that has no meat and is vegetarian and a (...)

@EU_Commission 0.1  A few months ago,  you created a European law making it illegal for industries or restaurants or traders of any kind to use the word "sausage", for any sausage not containing meat. You defined it as a if I remember correctly a sausage as being "meat". (...)
@EU_Commission Why does the EU still talk about Turkey? Erdogan in spitting in our faces but we still crawl into his dirty ass. WHYtf are we doing that?

The EU accession process continues to be based on established criteria, fair and rigorous conditionality, and the principle of own merits.

The EU is not complete without the Western Balkans. It's time we come together and unite in building a stronger Europe.

#EUenlargement

A new accession methodology puts an even stronger focus on fundamental reforms like the rule of law, the economy, or the functioning of democratic institutions, among others.

Our partners need to address them in the interest of their citizens and to advance on the 🇪🇺 path.

Empowering young people to shape the future!

We proposed to make 2022 the European Year of Youth. And deploy ALMA initiative, enabling young Europeans to gain professional experience abroad. 

It will help integrate them into education, vocational training or quality employment.

Strengthening the EU’s unique brand of global leadership!

Over the next year, we will set out a new global gateway strategy to build connectivity partnerships around the world to boost trade and investment.

We will accelerate work on a genuine European Defence Union, and more.

Making our social market economy more resilient!

We will focus on:
👦🏽quality jobs, fair working conditions, work-life balance
🏧setting out an initiative on minimum income
🏦facilitating access to capital for businesses
📈implementing the global corporate tax framework

Delivering the EU’s digital transformation by 2030!
The Single Market remains key to our innovation.

We will address:
🖥️concerns on the supply of semi-conductors
🛡️common cybersecurity standards
🛰️EU space-based secure communications system
🤳digital skills & more

#DigitalEU

Making Europe the world’s first climate neutral continent by 2050!

For this, we will take further steps towards:
🚊zero-emission mobility
💧improving water & air quality
🥦new rules on sustainable use of pesticides
📱the right to repair instead of replace products

#EUGreenDeal
